author: JamesWTruher
body:
```
PS> /bin/ls
PS> invoke-history
```

shows two different formats. If you try this with vi, you get an error message

```
PS> vi $profile
<now exit>
PS> invoke-history
Invoke-history : Vim: Warning: Output is not to a terminal
```

vi is still running, you can type `:q` and vi exits
title: invoke-history behaves strangely with native apps
